metadata.name: Aid Type Vocabulary
metadata.description: The AidTypeVocabulary codelist defines a range of external codelists which themselves provide codes and descriptions for aid type.

data.name: OECD DAC
data.description: List of codes provided by the OECD DAC used to distinguish types of aid

data.name: Earmarking Category
data.description: This vocabulary has been created by IATI and is derived from the Grand Bargain Earmarking Modality codelist

data.name: Earmarking Modality
data.description: Codes A to L replicated directly from Grand Bargain document found in Annex 1 (pg.16)

data.name: Cash and Voucher Modalities
data.description: This vocabulary has been created by IATI, following agreements and recommendations of the Tracking Cash and Voucher Assistance (CVA) Working Group.
